name: WeirdSynths
author: Millicent
description: Face tracking and vocal analysis modules — your face and voice become modular controllers via webcam and microphone

modules.name: NERVE
modules.description: Face landmark tracking to CV — 468 landmarks from your webcam become control voltages for any parameter

modules.name: SKULL
modules.description: Face-controlled drum machine — blink for kicks, jaw for snares, brows for hi-hats with built-in synthesis

modules.name: MIRROR
modules.description: Dot matrix CRT face display — see your face rendered in green phosphor wireframe from tracking data

modules.name: VOICE
modules.description: Vocal pitch tracker — YIN algorithm extracts V/Oct, gate, envelope, onset, brightness, and harmonics from audio
